name: Shyvana

sources.import_notes: Generated baseline canonical champion file from From Online dataset.

notes: Ability effects are intentionally minimal placeholders until scripted modeling is added.

passive.name: Fury of the Dragonborn
passive.description: Innate:  Shyvana gains  bonus armor and  bonus magic resist, which is permanently increased for every  elemental drake and  Elder Dragon her team slays.
passive.description_source: Fury of the Dragonborn's increased damage modifier to  Dragons does not affect true damage.

basic_ability_1.name: Twin Bite
basic_ability_1.description: Active:  Shyvana's next  basic attack within a few seconds will cause her to quickly strike again, dealing bonus physical damage.
basic_ability_1.description_source:
Applies  spell damage and procs  basic damage required effects.
PENDING FOR TEST: Dragon Form's Twin Bite can attack  stealthed units in the area.
Dragon Form's Twin Bite only applies the attack to enemies that would be hit by the second strike.
In Dragon Form, both strikes belong to the same cast instance. In Human Form, they belong in separate ones.
Since the second strike applies after the ability goes on cooldown, it will reduce its own cooldown.
Unlike most  on-hit effects, the one reducing the cooldown of Twin Bite also triggers against  structures.
In Dragon Form, Twin Bite consumes an additional stack of  Hail of Blades. (bug)
In Dragon Form, Twin Bite's area of effect can target units that are normally  untargetable to abilities, such as  wards, jungle plants.
This allows Dragon Form Twin Bite to instantly destroy  Yorick's  Dark Procession.(note)
The initial empowered attack rolls a  critical strike once for both strikes; either both will critically strike, or none will. If  Sundered Sky's Lightshield Strike is ready, both strikes will critically strike.

basic_ability_2.name: Burnout
basic_ability_2.description: Active:  Shyvana creates a flame aura, gaining a burst of  movement speed and continually dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.
basic_ability_2.description_source:
Magic damage on-hit can be  dodged and miss due to  blind.
PENDING FOR TEST:: Magic damage on-hit's interactions with  blocking effects.

basic_ability_3.name: Flame Breath
basic_ability_3.description: Active:  Shyvana unleashes a fireball in the target direction that stops upon hitting an enemy  champion. The fireball deals magic damage to enemies hit and marks them for a few seconds.
basic_ability_3.description_source:
The fireball applies  area damage and the  on-hit effect against marked targets deals  proc damage.
In Dragon Form, the fiery explosion applies  area damage and the burning scorch deals  persistent area damage to all enemies within the area of effect.
In Dragon Form, both areas of effect will be centered on the first champion struck, not at the location the missile collided with them.
This ability will cast from wherever the caster is at the end of the cast time.
In Dragon Form, the visual mark will not be applied to non-champions, but the debuff will still be applied for gameplay purposes.(bug)
Magic damage on-hit can be dodged by  dodging effects.
PENDING FOR TEST:: Magic damage on-hit's interactions with  blocking and  blinding effects.

ultimate.name: Dragon's Descent
ultimate.description:
Dragon Descent's  displacement immunity begins from the start of the cast time.
Dragon's Descent has a 100 / 80 / 66.67 / 57.14 / 50 seconds effective cooldown when not attacking and not dead.
Shyvana will not generate Fury if her attack misses due to  blind.
 Twin Bite's second strike will generate Fury.(bug)
PENDING FOR TEST: Fury generation with parrying effects ( dodge,  block)
